name: Market Town
description: A settlement focused on commerce provides diverse goods and services for the surrounding region. The commercial focus creates opportunities for profit and social networking, while the concentration of wealth attracts both customers and criminals.
atmosphere: Central market square hosts dozens of stalls selling goods from across the region while merchants haggle in multiple languages. The air fills with spices, leather, and commercial opportunity. Regular market days bring farmers and craftsmen together. Essential commercial hub for the surrounding area.
